channel.title: Guide of RuneScape [Ch-1 Lending]
channel.description:
[center][font=comic sans ms]This mini guide is a part of the [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,499007.0.html]The guide to RuneScape[/url] and has been contributed by user [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=502987]Andrew Ferguson.[/url] if you wish to view more guides like this or contribute please follow the link to the main post.[/font][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms]There are many ways to make profit in the game of RuneScape but one of the most noticeable lately has been the ability to lend out your high valued items to other players for profit without risk. This has been made popular due to the fact of free trade being back allowing for real profits to be made, this is also a great thing to do for those of you who sleep from time to time because you can lend out your items while you sleep for small profits each day. This guide will consist of methods of lending items out popular items, general price ranges for these items and most popular places to lend them.[/font][/center]
[center][b][font=comic sans ms]General price ranges:[/b] [font=comic sans ms](items can be added on request)[/font][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms][b]Bandos Godsword[/b][/font] ([url=http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Bandos_godsword/viewitem.ws?obj=11696][font=comic sans ms]Current market price[/font][/url]):[/center] [center][img]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/3410_obj_big.gif?id=11696[/img][/center] [center][font=comic sans ms][b]Price to lend for[/b]: 25-35k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms][b]Saradomin Godsword[/b][/font] ([url=http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Saradomin_godsword/viewitem.ws?obj=11698][font=comic sans ms]Current market price[/font][/url]):[/center] [center][img]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/3410_obj_big.gif?id=11698[/img][/center] [center][font=comic sans ms][b]Price to lend for[/b]: 45-65k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms][b]Zamorak Godsword[/b][/font] ([url=http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Zamorak_godsword/viewitem.ws?obj=11700][font=comic sans ms]Current market price[/font][/url]):[/center] [center][img]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/3410_obj_big.gif?id=11700[/img][/center] [center][font=comic sans ms][b]Price to lend for[/b]: 20-25k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms][b]Armadyl Godsword[/b][/font] ([url=http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Armadyl_godsword/viewitem.ws?obj=11694][font=comic sans ms]Current market price[/font][/url]):[/center] [center][img]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/3410_obj_big.gif?id=11694[/img][/center] [center][font=comic sans ms][b]Price to lend for[/b]: 50-75k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms][b]Saradomin Sword[/b][/font] ([url=http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Saradomin_sword/viewitem.ws?obj=11730][font=comic sans ms]Current market price[/font][/url]):[/center] [center][img]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/3410_obj_big.gif?id=11730[/img][/center] [center][font=comic sans ms][b]Price to lend for[/b]: 10-15k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms][b]Dragon claws[/b][/font] ([url=http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Dragon_claws/viewitem.ws?obj=14484][font=comic sans ms]Current market price[/font][/url]):[/center] [center][img]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/3410_obj_big.gif?id=14484[/img][/center] [center][font=comic sans ms][b]Price to lend for[/b]: 25-50k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms][b]Whip[/b][/font] ([url=http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Abyssal_whip/viewitem.ws?obj=4151][font=comic sans ms]Current market price[/font][/url]):[/center] [center][img]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/3410_obj_big.gif?id=4151[/img][/center] [center][font=comic sans ms][b]Price to lend for[/b]: 10-20k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms][b]Party hats (Any Color)[/b][/font] ([font=comic sans ms]Current market price: Click images[/font]):[/center] [center][url=http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Blue_partyhat/viewitem.ws?obj=1042][img]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/3410_obj_big.gif?id=1042[/img][/url][url=http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Green_partyhat/viewitem.ws?obj=1044][img]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/3410_obj_big.gif?id=1044[/img][/url][url=http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Purple_partyhat/viewitem.ws?obj=1046][img]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/3410_obj_big.gif?id=1046[/img][/url][url=http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Red_partyhat/viewitem.ws?obj=1038][img]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/3410_obj_big.gif?id=1038[/img][/url][url=http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/White_partyhat/viewitem.ws?obj=1048][img]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/3410_obj_big.gif?id=1048[/img][/url][url=http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Yellow_partyhat/viewitem.ws?obj=1040][img]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/3410_obj_big.gif?id=1040[/img][/url][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms][b]Price to lend for[/b]: 100-150k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms][b]Other rares[/b][/font] ([font=comic sans ms]Current market price: Click images[/font]):[/center] [center][url=http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Santa_hat/viewitem.ws?obj=1050][img]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/3410_obj_big.gif?id=1050[/img][/url][url=http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Blue_h'ween_mask/viewitem.ws?obj=1055][img]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/3410_obj_big.gif?id=1055[/img][/url][url=http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Red_h'ween_mask/viewitem.ws?obj=1057][img]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/3410_obj_big.gif?id=1057[/img][/url][url=http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/Green_h'ween_mask/viewitem.ws?obj=1053][img]http://services.runescape.com/m=itemdb_rs/3410_obj_big.gif?id=1053[/img][/url][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms][b]Price to lend for[/b]: 50-100k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms][b][size=14pt]Where to lend your items[/size][/b][/font][/center]
A common place to lend your items to players is on worlds one and two in the north-west part of the Grand Exchange (view images bellow). Once there you can lend your items to a massive amount of players waiting to borrow your item. Although most people would rather lend out their items for 24 hours for the most profit you must think of how the borrower (person your lending too) looks at the transaction, they want it for just long enough and at the cheepest they can get it. So lets say you see someone lending a Saradomin Godsword for 24 hours for 1200k (50k per hour), I (the borrower) would much rather pay 360k for 6 hours (60k per hour) so I can get exactly what I need. Keep this in mind while lending out your items.
[center][IMG]http://i1207.photobucket.com/albums/bb467/xandrwex/MoparGuide1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1207.photobucket.com/albums/bb467/xandrwex/MoparGuide2.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms]Something missing from this guide or incorrect? Post for us to correct it![/font][/center]

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:13, topic:401966”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=499019.msg3650659#msg3650659 date=1309714318]
Again, look at what I did with the Download/Tutorial lists, it spans over multiple posts
[/quote]
Yes but I’m a regular member, i cant dubble post or anything[/quote]I was a regular member when I made those as well. I worked with someone, it’s pretty simple. You just need to post, have them post, then you post, then they delete their post

Read full topic

item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[center][font=comic sans ms]This mini guide is a part of the The guide to RuneScape and has been contributed by user Andrew Ferguson.
if you wish to view more guides like this or contribute please follow the link to the main post.[/font][/center]

[center][font=comic sans ms]There are many ways to make profit in the game of RuneScape but one of the most noticeable lately has been the ability to lend out your high valued items to other players for profit without risk. This has been made popular due to the fact of free trade being back allowing for real profits to be made, this is also a great thing to do for those of you who sleep from time to time because you can lend out your items while you sleep for small profits each day. This guide will consist of methods of lending items out popular items, general price ranges for these items and most popular places to lend them.[/font][/center]

[center][font=comic sans ms]General price ranges:
[font=comic sans ms](items can be added on request)[/font][/center]

[center][font=comic sans ms]Bandos Godsword[/font] ([font=comic sans ms]Current market price[/font]):[/center]
[center][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms]Price to lend for: 25-35k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]

[center][font=comic sans ms]Saradomin Godsword[/font] ([font=comic sans ms]Current market price[/font]):[/center]
[center][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms]Price to lend for: 45-65k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]

[center][font=comic sans ms]Zamorak Godsword[/font] ([font=comic sans ms]Current market price[/font]):[/center]
[center][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms]Price to lend for: 20-25k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]

[center][font=comic sans ms]Armadyl Godsword[/font] ([font=comic sans ms]Current market price[/font]):[/center]
[center][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms]Price to lend for: 50-75k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]

[center][font=comic sans ms]Saradomin Sword[/font] ([font=comic sans ms]Current market price[/font]):[/center]
[center][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms]Price to lend for: 10-15k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]

[center][font=comic sans ms]Dragon claws[/font] ([font=comic sans ms]Current market price[/font]):[/center]
[center][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms]Price to lend for: 25-50k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]

[center][font=comic sans ms]Whip[/font] ([font=comic sans ms]Current market price[/font]):[/center]
[center][/center]
[center][font=comic sans ms]Price to lend for: 10-20k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]

[center][font=comic sans ms]Party hats (Any Color)[/font] ([font=comic sans ms]Current market price: Click images[/font]):[/center]
[center][/center]

[center][font=comic sans ms]Price to lend for: 100-150k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]

[center][font=comic sans ms]Other rares[/font] ([font=comic sans ms]Current market price: Click images[/font]):[/center]
[center][/center]

[center][font=comic sans ms]Price to lend for: 50-100k per hour (subject to change)[/font][/center]

[center][font=comic sans ms][size=14pt]Where to lend your items[/size][/font][/center]

A common place to lend your items to players is on worlds one and two in the north-west part of the Grand Exchange (view images bellow). Once there you can lend your items to a massive amount of players waiting to borrow your item. Although most people would rather lend out their items for 24 hours for the most profit you must think of how the borrower (person your lending too) looks at the transaction, they want it for just long enough and at the cheepest they can get it. So lets say you see someone lending a Saradomin Godsword for 24 hours for 1200k (50k per hour), I (the borrower) would much rather pay 360k for 6 hours (60k per hour) so I can get exactly what I need. Keep this in mind while lending out your items.
